text: Ara yakhana tini mad‌yanera kupera kache paumchalena [1], dekhate pelena, ekadala loka tadera janoyaraguloke pani pana karacche ebam tadera pichane dujana nari tadera pasuguloke agale rakhache. Musa balalena, ‘tomadera ki byapara [2]?’ Tara balala, ‘amara amadera janoyaraguloke pani pana karate pari na, yataksana rakhalera tadera janoyaraguloke niye sare na yaya. Ara amadera pita khuba brd'dha [3].’
